description: FULUHUAPIN Night Light LED Nightlight Automatic brightness adjustment for Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Hallway, Stairs (2 Pack)

High brightness LED inside. Lights up at dusk, turns off at dawn automatically. It lasts up to 100000 hours. Cool to the touch. Low maintenance cost, convenient to use and so on. It could be used in bedroom or other place which needs micro light.
4. Dimension：3 in l x 4.5 in h x 1.4 in w (76mm x 114mm x 30mm)；

This LED sensor night light lights up by the brightness of light. The photoconductive resistance inside the night light detect the external light. small night light brightness according to thelight will automatically adjust the brightness of LED lightsand darker Or lighter in external light automatically turned on or off the light.

Risk of electric shock and fire hazard. This product is not a toy and is not intended for use by children. For adult use only. For safe use, plug only into exposed wall outlets where device is ventilated and cannot contact bed coverings or other material. Do not use with extension cords.
